alert.note: Alert for Chester; Delaware (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 22 at 6:17PM EDT until May 22 at 9:00PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 700 PM EDT FOR NORTHERN NEW CASTLE...SOUTHEASTERN CHESTER AND SOUTHERN DELAWARE COUNTIES... At 617 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Roxborough to Philadelphia International Arpt to near Newark, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to roofs, siding, trees, and power lines is possible. Locations impacted include... Wilmington, Newark, Chester, Westtown, Folcroft, Swarthmore, Elsmere, Kennett Square, New Castle, Newport, Arden, Darby Township, Stanton, Cheyney, Glasgow, Talleyville, Elam, Chelsea, Greenville and Landenberg. This includes the following highways... Interstate 95 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 0 and 11. Interstate 95 in Delaware between mile markers 1 and 23. Interstate 476 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 0 and 3. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
